metadata.title: CVE-2021-46313 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: The binary MP4Box in GPAC v1.0.1 was discovered to contain a segmentation fault via the function __memmove_avx_unaligned_erms (). This vulnerability can lead to a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
